Post.title: : Spring AOP  #1 - aspects
Post.description: Spring AOP top problem #2 - java.lang.ClassCastException: $Proxy7  spring AOP  spring ()()
Post.content:
http://denis-zhdanov.blogspot.com/2009/07/spring-aop-top-problem-1-aspects-are.html

Spring AOP top problem #2 - java.lang.ClassCastException: $Proxy7 spring AOP spring ()()

(self-calls).

spring - 8.6.1 Understanding AOP proxies spring /

spring spring aop

AopService.java

TestAspect.java

spring-config.xml

SpringStart.java

aspect public service SpringStart -

service

AopService.java

aspect 3 - service() anotherService() SpringStart.main() service() AopService.anotherService() aspect SpringStart.main() i.e. AopService.anotherService() service()

problem root is tightly connected to The Law of Leaky AbstractionsI.e. aspect spring aop

spring AOP (proxy-based)i.e. bean aspect (be advised by particular aspect(s) the container injects aspect-aware bean proxy) bean :

I.e. aspect raw bean aspect AopService anotherService() service() - this , i.e. rawBean aspect

  • aspect self-calls - ;

  • aspect-aware proxy self-calls, i.e. anotherService() ((AopService) AopContext.currentProxy()).service() service() - spring ;

  • aspectj weaving - aspect class i.e. ;

spring aspectj weaving

Post.title: github-pages  jekyll
Post._content:
github-pages  jekyll 

<!-- more -->

>  macOS 10.12.2

#  github-pages

---

>  https://pages.github.com

1. 
 github  `username.github.io` `username`**note: **

2. clone  `git clone https://github.com/username/username.github.io`

3.  hello world`cd username.github.io && echo "Hello World" > index.html`

4. push `git add --all && git commit -m "Initial commit" && git push -u origin master`

5.  `http://username.github.io`

#  jekyll 

---

 `ruby --version`  `ruby`Mac 

![ruby_version.png](http://upload-images.jianshu.io/upload_images/1768578-d51c03c25e21438d.png?imageMogr2/auto-orient/strip%7CimageView2/2/w/1240)

 jekyll `gem install jekyll`

 `index.html` `jekyll new .`jekyll  `jekyll serve` `http://127.0.0.1:4000/`

 `_config.yml` 

 `http://jekyllcn.com/`

# 

---

 jekyll 



 - [http://jekyllthemes.org/](http://jekyllthemes.org/)
 - [https://mademistakes.com/work/jekyll-themes/](https://mademistakes.com/work/jekyll-themes/)

 `Minimal Mistakes Theme` 



![minimal_mistakes.png](http://upload-images.jianshu.io/upload_images/1768578-adf87c2843b91b17.png?imageMogr2/auto-orient/strip%7CimageView2/2/w/1240)


## 

 clone  github-pages 

 Gemfile 

```
source "https://rubygems.org"

gem "github-pages", group: :jekyll_plugins

group :jekyll_plugins do
  gem "jekyll-paginate"
  gem "jekyll-sitemap"
  gem "jekyll-gist"
  gem "jekyll-feed"
  gem "jemoji"
end
```

 `bundle update` 



- `.editorconfig`
- `.gitattributes`
- `.github`
- `/docs`
- `/test`
- `CHANGELOG.md`
- `minimal-mistakes-jekyll.gemspec`
- `README.md`
- `screenshot-layouts.png`
- `screenshot.png`

 `bundle exec jekyll serve`  `localhost:4000`
